mods.abstract: Hank Thompson radio show for KWTX, Waco, Texas (unconfirmed). Special broadcast featuring Tex Ritter, promoting his live show at the Waco Theater. Musicians include Coby Jones (vocals), Henry "Smudgie" Cedrone (accordion, unconfirmed), Spud Goodall (guitar, unconfirmed) and June.
